name: Joe Mamoe.cpp
description:
I'm 13 and this is my first ever entry in my first ever game jam. Expect crappiness, and bad english. This game was rushed because I had to work on other things. Made with javid's ConsoleGameEngine (awesome tutorials btw) 

Joe_Mamoe.cpp is a mysterious file you found on your desktop. When you try to debug it, something strange starts to happen but you can't quite put the finger on it...

M̵̢̥̞̫̞̑̈́͊͒͝a̵͉̩͖̋͆̎̕͠y̵͙̋b̸̮͕̽̀̆͒è̵͇̮̂ ̵̛̣̈́̌̐͠ŷ̶̝̗̓̓̔̌o̵̟̝̤̒̊̽͐̈́ù̵͖͎̋'̵̪̔r̵̞̱͕̯̻͂͆̏̽ḙ̶̿ ̵̩̣͕͛̂j̶̮̹̈́͂u̶̡̝͉̻͈͗͋̐s̸̢̞̓̚͝t̴͍̥͛̈́͗̀͜ ̵̻̲̆̚̕c̷̠̰̞̹̊̈́̀͋̊r̴̭̫̥͈͑͛͆̋ǎ̸̖͉́̎z̴̤̟̦̘̭̉̆́y̷̢͙͈͚͉̾̄̓͂.

(the game's finish is not buggy in the second version.)
